meanings.definition: A plant cultivated for use in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I picked some fresh potherb from the garden for our soup.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for various potherbs like spinach and kale.
meanings.sent3: Grandma accidentally added too much potherb to the stew, making it extra green!
meanings.sent4: The potherb in the dish was like a burst of flavor in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the potherb made the salad look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A leafy vegetable used in culinary dishes.
meanings.sent1: The market had a great selection of fresh potherbs for sale.
meanings.sent2: She added some chopped potherb to the stir-fry for added nutrition.
meanings.sent3: The potherb in the salad seemed to dance with the other ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The potherb on the plate was a splash of green against the white tablecloth.
